Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
Manages the player's inventory, hunger, and health

    void
    addKarma()
    Adds a value of 1 to the player's karma field if karma is less than or equal to 10

    adrDecay()
    Called whenever the player picks up / drops an item or attacks an enemy, reduces the player's adrenaline level by 1, displaying a message if it happens to be fully depleted

    Called whenever a player moves between rooms, fully resets the player's adrenaline level if it is above zero, then displays a message

  • Method Details

    • obtain

      public void obtain(Item item)
      Adds an item to the player's inventory
      Parameters:
      item - An item from the player's inventory

    • lose

      public void lose(Item item)
      Removes an item from the player's inventory
      Parameters:
      item - An item from the player's inventory

    • ListInventory

      public void ListInventory()
      Displays all items within the player's inventory

    • inventoryArray

      public ArrayList<Item> inventoryArray()
      Returns:
      ArrayList Returns a copy of the player's inventory arraylist

    • checkForItem

      public boolean checkForItem(Item item)
      Checks whether or not an item is in the player's inventory
      Parameters:
      item - An item from the player's inventory
      Returns:
      boolean True if item is found, False if it is not found

    • checkEdible

      public boolean checkEdible(Item item)
      Checks whether or not an item within the player's inventory is edible
      Parameters:
      item - An item from the player's inventory
      Returns:
      boolean True if item is edible, False if it is not edible

    • tryeat

      public void tryeat(Item item)
      Calls checkForItem() and checkEdible() on an item within the player's inventory Then calls eat() if both methods return true
      Parameters:
      item - An item from the player's inventory

    • eat

      private void eat(Item item)
      Removes an item from the player's inventory and adds a value to the player's hunger field Also calls another method, strength(), if the item happens to be a fruit
      Parameters:
      item - An item from the player's inventory

    • hungry

      public void hungry()
      Called when a player moves to another room, reduces the player's hunger field as well as it's health if said field happens to be below 1
      Parameters:
      args - Unused

    • weightClass

      public int weightClass()
      Returns:
      int The player's wc or "weight class" field

    • strength

      public void strength()
      Adds a value of 2 to the player's wc field

    • addKarma

      public void addKarma()
      Adds a value of 1 to the player's karma field if karma is less than or equal to 10

    • maxKarma

      public void maxKarma()
      Sets the player's karma value to 10

    • hold

      public void hold(Item item)
      Sets the player's holding field to the requested item
      Parameters:
      item - The item the player would like to hold

    • getHolding

      public Item getHolding()
      Returns:
      Item Return the item the player is currently holding

    • findItem

      public Item findItem(String name)
      Finds an item within the players inventory using a string and returns it as an item
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item to find
      Returns:
      Item Returns the object within the player's inventory matching the string parameter

    • getKarma

      public int getKarma()
      Returns:
      The player's current karma

    • adrLevel

      public int adrLevel()
      Returns:
      The player's current adrenaline level

    • attackedBy

      public void attackedBy(Enemy enemy)
      Called by the attack method within the Game class, reduces player health by the amount returned by enemy.getDamage()
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy to attack the player

    • attackedBy

      public void attackedBy(Enemy enemy, boolean evaded)
      Called by the attack method within the Game class, reduces player health by the amount returned by enemy.getDamage()
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy to attack the player, a boolean which tells if the enemy has evaded the player's last attack

    • evade

      public void evade()
      Called by the player, restores health and drains hunger

    • adrDecay

      public void adrDecay()
      Called whenever the player picks up / drops an item or attacks an enemy, reduces the player's adrenaline level by 1, displaying a message if it happens to be fully depleted

    • adrReset

      public void adrReset()
      Called whenever a player moves between rooms, fully resets the player's adrenaline level if it is above zero, then displays a message

    • damageItem

      public void damageItem(Item item)
      Called after the player attacks an enemy, reduces the durability of the item the player is currently holding
      Parameters:
      item - The item the player is currently holding

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Returns:
      int Returns the player's health value

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Called when the player dies, resets player inventory and private fields
